price: (68) And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allāh is most knowing of what you do.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
